definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: The brightness of this star varies over a period of about 11 months.
sentences.chinese: 这颗变星的亮度变化大约持续11个月。

sentences.english: Algol is probably the most famous variable star in all the heavens.
sentences.chinese: 大陵五可能是天空中最著名的变星了。

sentences.english: Mira is one of the most famous of all variable stars.
sentences.chinese: 𫇴藁增二是所有著名变星中的一颗。

sentences.english: It's a variable star, Omicron Ceti, whose proper name is Mira.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼座的o星是一颗变星，它的固有名为𫇴藁增二。

sentences.english: Another type of standard candle is a type of star called a Cepheid variable.
sentences.chinese: 另一种标准烛光是一种叫做造父变星的恒星。

sentences.english: These objects include variable stars as well as supernovae.
sentences.chinese: 这些物体包括象超新星这样的变星。

sentences.english: American Association of Variable Star Observers.
Cepheid's distance can thus be calculated with great accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 依次，一个造父变星的距离便可非常准确地计算出来。

sentences.english: After blinking and measuring, two flare stars and 15 variable stars are found.
sentences.chinese: 经过闪视和测量，共发现两颗新耀星和15颗新变星。

sentences.english: Young variable star RY Tauri is emerging from a yellowish cocoon of dust near top center.
sentences.chinese: 最上面正中一年轻的变星正在破茧而出。

sentences.english: Welcome to the American Association of Variable Star Observers (AAVSO) Nova Search program.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎访问美国变星协会新星搜索组。

sentences.english: Usually, we analyze variation stars or occultation events by applying aperture photometry.
sentences.chinese: 传统上寻找变星或掩星的方法是测光分析。

sentences.english: Intermediate polars are a type of cataclysmic variable star system.
sentences.chinese: 中度极化的双星系统是激变变星中的一种类型。

definition: see 恆星系|恒星系[heng2 xing1 xi4]
